name: 8.23 "The Ghost and Mrs. Lebec" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What number did Carla say Darryl Mead was on the Red Sox?
questions.explanation:
43.

	Darryl Mead was played by Kevin Conroy. He was born in 1955 in Westbury, New York.

questions.text: What did Frasier say gave him a warm fuzzy?
questions.correct: The thought that Lilith will date again if he dies first.
options: The thought of dating after Lilith dies.
The thought of Eddie playing hockey in heaven.
The guy who just complimented him.
questions.explanation:
The thought that Lilith will date again if he dies first.

	They were talking about Carla dating again now that Eddie has passed away. Lilith said she would date if Frasier died after an appropriate amount of time.

Lady Baldy.

	Lady Baldy was a product that removes hair from women's legs. It pulled the hair from the roots and caused pain and bleeding.

questions.text: What did Carla keep seeing everyone wearing?
questions.explanation:
hockey masks.

	The men in hockey masks represented Eddie. Eddie, before he joined the ice show, was a hockey player (the goalie) for the Boston Bruins.

questions.text: What did Frasier say Lilith could use?
questions.explanation:
sun.

	Carla called Lilith "the dead". Frasier said that it wasn't the dead it was just Lilith "granted she could use a little more sun".

questions.text: What did Frasier say the difference between him and a psychic was?
questions.explanation:
He could prescribe pills.

	Carla was going to have her psychic adviser contact Eddie to find out why he didn't want her to date. Frasier thought that the woman was a scam artist.

questions.text: Who owned the product that Rebecca was complaining about it?
questions.explanation:
Robin Colcord.

	When she found this out she said she didn't really want to complain. She then showed everyone how much she liked the product even though she was in tears from the pain.

questions.text: What is the name of Carla's psychic?
questions.explanation:
Madame Lazora.

	Madam Lazora was played by Georgia Brown. She was born in London, England and once went with her family to Wales to escape the German Blitzkrieg.

questions.text: Who drank beer with a straw?
questions.explanation:
Norm.

	It was during the seance when he was holding hands with Woody and Carla. He later said he learned something, for now on "it was beer through a straw".

questions.text: Why did the psychic say Eddie said Carla didn't want to date?
questions.correct: She was scared because she hadn't been on a date in 3 years.
options: She knew Eddie would be angry if she dated again.
She couldn't find a man as wonderful as Eddie was.
She felt she was dishonoring Eddie.
questions.explanation:
She was scared because she hadn't been on a date in 3 years.

	Carla was the one who initially said she was scared to date again. Madame Lazora then said Eddie said she was correct.
